article_title: When Should Kids Get Control of Their Money?
article_text:
You spend years building up savings for your children—tucking away monetary gifts they've received and building a college fund. But deciding if and when they are ready to take the financial reins can be tricky. So we asked The Experts: At what age should you give young adults control of money you have been accumulating for them?

This discussion relates to the latest Investing in Funds & ETFs Report and formed the basis of a...
